items.title: Cardinal Robert Prevost becomes the first American pope, choosing the name Leo XIV
items.description: Cardinal Robert Prevost has been elected pope, the first time an American has led the Roman Catholic Church. Provost, 69, chose the name Pope Leo XIV.
